

I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '1';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_firstname, customers_lastname
                         from customers
                         where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = 'hibekk9184mm1086pq0hrfu214' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, p.master_categories_id
                       from products p
                       where p.products_id = '5' limit 1;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select parent_id
                                from categories
                                where categories_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select categories_name
                           from categories_description
                           where categories_id = '2'
                           and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select *
        from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                   from products_description
                   where products_id = '5'
             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter, session_counter from counter_history where startdate='20121207';



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM counter_history WHERE startdate = '20121207' AND counter = 1 AND session_counter = 1 LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter from counter;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT p.products_id, p.products_model, p.products_image,
                              p.products_price, p.products_tax_class_id, pd.products_name
                       FROM products p, products_description pd
                       WHERE p.products_id = 5
                       AND p.products_status = '1'
                       AND p.products_id = pd.products_id
                       AND pd.language_id = 1;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT customers_firstname, customers_lastname, customers_email_address
                   FROM customers
                   WHERE customers_id = 1;



I AM HERE product_reviews_write
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'hibekk9184mm1086pq0hrfu214';
